instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a high-energy, trustworthy platform. Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue' templates. Use the Saffron/Amber accents to give it an Indian startup identity without being clichÃ©.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Implement a 'ThemeToggle' but default to Light Mode with the 'Warm Stone' background. Dark mode should be deep navy/slate, not pure black.
instructions_to_main_agent.navigation: Create a distinct separation between 'Hiring' and 'Mentorship' portals in the nav. Maybe a toggle switch at the top level.
instructions_to_main_agent.chat: The chat interface is critical. Make it feel instant and familiar (like WhatsApp/Telegram web). Use full width on mobile.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Role-based dashboards are key. Startup Dashboard = Analytics heavy. Job Seeker = Feed/List heavy. Mentor = Calendar/Request heavy.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions. Stagger list items in job feeds. Smooth hover effects on all interactive elements.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
